articles.title: After Test struggles, South Africa pin hopes on new T20 league - News24
articles.description: Two days after the end of a humiliating Test tour of Australia by South Africa, a new Twenty20 league, the SA20, will be launched in Cape Town on Tuesday.

articles.title: HIV remains a leading killer in Africa despite medical breakthroughs—how to eliminate it - Medical Xpress
articles.description: About 38 million people around the world are living with HIV. About 70% of them live in Africa. This shows that there is no solution to the AIDS pandemic without a solution in Africa. In 2021, there were 1.5 million new cases of HIV—just over 4,000 cases per …

articles.title: Releaf secures $3.3 million Pre-Series a funding, unveils new technologies to drive profitability for consumer goods manufacturers - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: Releaf, a technology company that makes it easier for consumer goods manufacturers in Africa to access high-quality ingredients for their factories, has raised $3.3 million in an oversubscribed Pre-Series A funding round.

articles.title: Beninese vote in 1st legislative polls since return of opposition - Africanews English
articles.description: Over six million Beninese were called to elect 109 MPs on Sunday (Jan. 08). The election marks the return of opposition candidates after a four-year absence.
articles.content:
